data.title: GST 105 History and Philosophy of Science
data.meta_description:
Gst 105 History and Philosophy of Science - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an overview of the course guide for GST 105 "History and Philosophy of Science". It outlines the following key details:

- The course is a one semester, two-unit foundation level course open to both science and non-science students. 

- The course aims to stimulate critical thinking about science and help students develop a personal philosophy. It will cover the origins and evolution of science as well as contributions of ancient Africans and Nigerians.  

- The course objectives are to analyze the nature of science, discuss scientific theories and history, and recognize relationships between science, technology and society.

- The course requirements include reading study units, textbooks, and completing assignments for assessment. The course is
